title: Man accidentally shot, killed by 4 year old in Brown County, authorities say
content:
A 22-year-old man is dead after what authorities believe was an accidental shooting involving a 4 year old earlier this week.
According to Brown County Coroner Michael Carlsen, the victim, Eh Thon Gar, died after a being shot by a 4-year-old child on Monday.
Carlsen says that the case is being investigated by the Brown County Sheriff’s Office and that they are working under the presumption that the shooting was accidental.
An autopsy is being conducted Wednesday.
